headline: NovaGold (NG) Soars to 5-Year High as Gold Breaks Past $5,100
summary: We recently published 10 Big Names With Easy 10-30% Gains. NovaGold Resources Inc. (NYSEAmerican:NG) was one of the best performers on Tuesday. NovaGold soared to a new five-year record on Tuesday, as investors took heart from gold’s climb to the $5,100 territory during the day—extending a run of all-time highs. At intra-day trading, NovaGold Resources […]

headline: Scotiabank, Citi, and Raymond James Raise Newmont (NEM) Price Targets
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is one of the 11 Most Profitable Cheap Stocks to Invest In Now. On January 26, Scotiabank increased its price target on Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) from $114 to $152 and maintained its Outperform rating on the stock. This decision comes as the firm is updating its price targets for gold and precious […]

headline: LyondellBasell to Post Q4 Earnings: What's in the Cards for the Stock?

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Newmont (NEM) After Its Strong Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Newmont's share price still offers value after its strong run, this article walks through the numbers so you can judge that for yourself. The stock last closed at US$127.00, with returns of 6.8% over 7 days, 20.1% over 30 days, 25.5% year to date and 212.3% over 1 year, as well as 160.2% over 3 years and 149.4% over 5 years. Recent price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in gold producers and large cap miners, as investors look at companies with...
